Text: In the Zone OnlineGaming NewsletterN T H E Z O N E The Official Newsletter of the MSN Gaming Zone May Play it on the Zone newsletterasp S P O N S O R E D B Y T H E U N I T E D S T A T E S A I R F O R C E If youre looking for adventure thats bigger than a video game how does fullthrottle mph upsidedown sound If youre ready for an upgrade check out some real adventures and real stories at the following website newsletterasp WHATS HOT AND HAPPENING From May Until the End of the Year Announcing the Premiere of OutSmart The next best thing to live TV OutSmart makes you a contestant in a trivia gameshow event interacting with your favorite celebrities From now until June th match up with Dark Angel star Jessica Alba and see how she holds up to your pressure Then upload your score to be entered in the first of our many prize drawings Well be running OutSmart celebrity contests throughout the year with new drawings every month newsletterasp Toyota Tundra Belt yourself into the newest Toyota Tundra and experience Tundra Madness Jump into a shiny new Toyota Tundra pickup and get ready to race Rip around the track at blinding speed Hit Toyota Gnomes for extra points Add more to your score by stopping in and picking up a hefty load of construction supplies Beat the clock and register the best time to win Whether youre playing just for fun or competing in the Tundra Madness tournaments there are plenty of thrills for all Play today newsletterasp MAGNIFICENT MAY EVENTS Throughout May May Mice Spotlight Tournaments Its the month of flowers bees birds and mice Optical Mice Welcome to the world of no moving parts In our Spotlight Series for May Grand Prize winners can catch one of these wonderful new peripherals for their very own Build a better mousetrap and the world will beat a path to your door but build a better mouse and the world can visit your homepage without degunking a rollerball newsletterasp Now Until June Bejeweled Sweepstakes Win actual gemstudded All jewelry in our spring Bejeweled Sweepstakes Upload your score on scheduled days to be automatically entered to win up to times per week newsletterasp Every Friday in Fighter Ace Fighter Ace Fox Hunt newsletterasp EXTRA EXTRA READ ALL ABOUT IT Fighter Ace Dogfight Death Match for Cash Each Saturday and Sunday from now until the end of May were holding two deathmatch events The winners from each will be paired in a showdown for cash Whats more these two finalists will be eligible to compete for the grand prize finale The Death Match for Cash is sponsored by the United States Air Force When youve tapped out on virtualreality flying consider the real thing Build a life thats above and beyond in the Air Force newsletterasp Microsoft at E The Electronic Entertainment Expo or E is computer gamings premier convention showing off the wares of the biggest studios and publishers in the industry Five huge Las Vegas convention halls will be packed solid with software and hardware shown to the public for the first time Log into the Microsoft Games site on May th to follow this years event which will feature Xbox demos and the rollout of the nextgeneration console and PC titles Dont miss the coverage on Ensemble Studios followup to Age of Empires Age of Mythology which brings mythical monsters and heroes to realtime strategy Microsoft will also be showing off Blood Wake where highspeed boat chasing is served up with guns for the most potent adrenaline cocktail in years newsletterasp Chat with the Producer of Mechcommander FASAs fivestar general of game development Mitch Gitelman will field your questions May in the Zone Theater chat room With the sequel to the groundshaking Mechcommander RTS less than a month away from going gold were sure the conversation will be lively especially when Mitch gets going on spanking As Mitch says its a topic for mature readers so dont show it to the reporter for Highlights magazine newsletterasp Asherons Call A Changing of the Ways Last month saw the arrival of gambling halls to Dereth and the opening of the Lugian stronghold Linvak Tukal May will witness The Changing of the Ways with the arrival of Eluards Guild What is the guild Who is Eluard What does the changing of ways portend Read the teaser for more information newsletterasp MAGAZINE OUTLET COLLECT YOUR BONUS As our way of introducing you to the fantastic benefits of Zone membership weve arranged an exclusive grab bag of items totaling up to in value While supplies last you can come take your pick of dozens of items including new CDROM games the best gaming magazines Samsonite travel accessories and more Quantities are limited so hurry you wont want to miss out on this one newsletterasp SUPER MARIO FOR GAME BOY ADVANCE Be the first on your block to grasp the power of Super Mario Preorder your copy now for Game Boy Advance from BestBuycom newsletterasp You received this email newsletter as a result of your Zone membership THIS DOCUMENT IS PROVIDED FOR
